Module com.example.mydmsproject

Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

package com.example.mydmsproject.model
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Ball
    A Sprite class implements the main game element Ball, store lists of buffs/bonusBalls and total game score as well.
    BonusBall
    A Ball class act as a ball, hide within a brick and appear in a probability when the brick breaks, fall with acceleration.
    Brick
    A Sprite class implements the main game element Brick, store Crack objects.
    Buff
    A Ball class, hide within a brick and appear in a probability when the brick breaks, fall with acceleration.
    Crack
    A Sprite class, appears in red and green bricks when the brick is hit by a ball.
    Lightning
    A Sprite class, can be "carried" by both the main Ball and the Paddle.
    Paddle
    A Sprite class implements the main game element Paddle, controlled by keyboard or mouse.
    Scenes
    A model class that stores all scenes, game elements and sounds, act as a mediator between controllers, used for getting/setting scenes and other elements.
    Sprite
    An abstract parent model class providing basic functionalities such as image rendering and position setting for other game elements.
    Wall
    A model class that stores all game elements, act as a mediator between GameController and GameRenderer, used for getting/setting game elements and make new levels.
